most_active_tickets.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services

common_issues.title: Pieces Core Services Fails to Connect to Pieces OS
common_issues.description: Users are unable to open Pieces Core Services due to a failure to connect to Pieces OS. The error message indicates an Internal Server Error (500) from Pieces OS.  The issue appears on macOS and may be related to Pieces OS version compatibility or network connectivity problems. Check Pieces OS logs for more details and ensure network connectivity.

related_issues.title: Unable to open Pieces Core Services
related_issues.text:
Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Error: Exception: Failed to connect to Pieces OS: egb(message: {"error":"Internal Server Error","eventId":"a15f7d493d8240e49814ec0911735b49"}, code: 500)

**Installation Details**

Succeeded: true
Path: /Applications/Pieces OS.app

**PiecesOS Information**

ID: 0E0DEC52-37A2-48F1-A9D4-60777810D59B
User: 7a4866bc-84fb-4c6c-a339-8cb5ea80d479
Current Version: 12.3.0
Min Version Supported: 12.3.0
Max Version Supported: 13.0.0
Local Port: 39300

**Device Information**

Operating System: MacOS
Current Version: Version 15.3.1 (Build 24D70)
Min Version Supported: 12.0.0 Monterey
Additional Device Information: {cpu_list: [{"architecture":"arm64","cores":14,"logicalProcessors":14,"l1Cache":{"value":65536,"units":"Bytes"},"l2Cache":{"value":4194304,"units":"Bytes"},"description":"Apple M4 Max"}], gpu_list: [{"type":"Apple M4 Max","unifiedMemoryArchitecture":true,"cores":32,"dedicatedVRam":null}], memory_info: {"totalRAM":{"value":38654705664,"units":"Bytes"}}, display_list: [{"nativeHeight":2234,"nativeWidth":3456,"scaledHeight":1117,"scaledWidth":1728,"primary":true}]}
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate the root cause of the "Pieces Core Services Fails to Connect to Pieces OS" issue, focusing on Pieces OS version compatibility and network connectivity.
Prioritize resolution of ticket #863, "Unable to open Pieces Core Services", as it has the highest activity level.
Proactively monitor Pieces OS logs for errors related to connection failures and Internal Server Errors (500).
Improve error messaging to provide more specific information to users and support staff.
Consider implementing a system to automatically detect and diagnose common issues, such as the one described.
